name: Dodge the Blocks!
description:
Dodge The Blocks is a fun platformer game where you control a small red cube as it tries to navigate its way through a multitude of levels.

Controls are pretty simple;

[W] = Move forward

[S] = Move backwards

[A] = Move left

[D] = Move right

[R] = Restart

[SPACE] = Jump/Glide

If you have any questions or concerns, you can find me in my studio discord: https://discord.gg/b473nPD
